iati-activity.title: Increase household income and livelihood security for 38,000 people and create up to 2,400 jobs in Uganda, Rwanda and Malawi by providing free remote consulting to 1,200 local, micro and small business entrepreneurs
iati-activity.description: Grow Movement empowers African entrepreneurs with business skills by phone, Skype and email. This is done by a global team of volunteer business professionals who commit 40 hours of their time across a 6 month period to share skills on marketing, finance and strategy.
iati-activity.participating-org: Uganda - Enterprise Uganda Rwanda - Educat Malawi - NABW

transaction.description: Total Project Budget. DFID Â£150K across 3 years, plus others
